_source.text: Aaron Rodgers(like Tom Brady, Drew Brees, Brett Favre, Peyton Manning, and all other HOF Quarterbacks) makes receivers look better than they really are I bet if we sent Jerome Simpson to GB he would have close to 1000 yards with 8+ touchdowns this year even with his suspension.
